website_summaries.verdict: These computer glasses are a popular choice among gamers and full-time computer users.
cons: Lenses are reflective on both sides, which creates glare

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for gaming/graphic design.
customer_reviews.text: I received these last night and immediately did a comparison to the Gunnars I'd been using for gaming at home. These are obviously a higher quality product. The materials look much better, and they don't feel like cheap plastic. The lenses are far darker than the Gunnars, and they affect color integrity to a much greater extent. So much so that I DO NOT recommend these for gaming or graphic design. For programming or general office desk work, these are fantastic. But they affect the color far too much for other uses. Gunnars will remain at home for gaming use, these are going to work with me.
customer_reviews.author: Fartblaster

customer_reviews.title: Wear every night
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these glasses for 8 months and wear them almost every night while I'm watching tv. They have made a noticeable difference in how fast I can fall asleep by blocking the blue light that disrupts melatonin. I still try and turn off the tv an hour before bed but wear the glasses 1-2 hours before that. They are made out of very sturdy and good quality materials (frame, lens, and hinge spring) the only fault I have with it is - for me being a male with a larger face- the regular size frame is a bit on the small side. I would like to see a larger frame made.
customer_reviews.author: conrad david spangler

customer_reviews.title: Block blue light, but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these and a pair from THL Sleep to compare. The material they're made of is exactly the same, and I found the glasses from THL Sleep to be much more comfortable (although I got the size large from THL and regular from Swannies - I'm a woman with an average size head). The Swannies felt more uncomfortable around the bridge of my nose. And the lenses are identical. THL Sleep actually seems to block more blue light. Swannies do seem to have less glare though. But they are also a lot more expensive. They do block blue light, but so do cheaper options. You don't need verified tests to know when they're blocking blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Nina C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Gunnars for sleep, too strong for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I've got both Gunnar Optiks and these, and think you should use them for different things. If you need glasses to help you fall asleep, get the Swannies, hands down. They block out basically all blue light and it's much easier to pass out after wearing these. If you're buying glasses for gaming, better visual acuity, and eye strain relief, get the Gunnar Optiks (they even have prescription models).
customer_reviews.author: Howard J.

customer_reviews.title: cool look
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed I am sleeping better since I started wearing these glasses. Further, the women in my department seem to let their gaze linger a touch longer when they see me and I have the glasses on. One coworker told me bluntly that 'the women love me, and the men want to be me"..... although this was true even before I got my glasses. I give them my sincere recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: James J. W.

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made frame - poor vision through lenses
customer_reviews.text: i bought these more expensive onces in the hopes of having higher quality frames and lenses. BIG disappointment. cheap plastic frames that are extremely difficult to adjust to your head without breaking them. they are also very uncomfortable. the bluelight blocking feature does works well, but vision through the lenses are a bit cloudy and unclear. save your money and buy the 30 dollar pair for the same type of poor quality. or buy a good pair from your eye doctor if you want a higher quality frame with good vision through the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: a.m.

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep aid.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to see if they would help with my sleep at night. It took a few days but o really feel these have made a huge difference. I normally have to read for an hour or 2 to get to sleep. I find now that after wearing these for an hour or 2 before bedtime that I only can read about 15 mins then I feel really tired and fall asleep. Most importantly, I stay asleep. I’m on my 50s and anyone at this age knows how difficult sleep can be. These made a huge difference. Better than melatonin or sleeping pills.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffo

customer_reviews.title: They’re crooked
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. I bought these and they were crooked. Every time I wear them I try to bend them in the right direction but it doesn’t stay and I don’t want to break them. I have to wear them with the ear rest part way up the side of my head. I recently looked at myself in the mirror with them and the crookedness makes me look ridiculous. This isn’t acceptable for this amount of money. Unfortunately it’s too late for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: They work!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses because I have to stare at 2 computer screens for 8-9 hours a day. I notice my eyes were getting dry, burning, and felt strained. They felt like raisins. Now that i have been using these for 2 going on 3 weeks i have noticed a huge difference. My eyes feel like grapes now. Lol. It is essential to take care of your eyes since they are the only 2 you'll have for the rest of your life.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsz

customer_reviews.title: Helps with migraines
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help reduce the frequency/severity of my migraines and visual migraines since I spend the majority of each day staring at screens. They have helped a lot (no light shows since I started using them), and I put them on whenever I feel the beginnings of a migraine coming on. Resting my eyes is better, but that's not always an option. It's almost impossible to view yellow highlights on spreadsheets when wearing them, but other than that, they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gaelwyn

customer_reviews.title: Too oragne
customer_reviews.text: The color is too orange. They may work but I don't like seeing everything as orange. It may block blue light but it just wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: W. C. Blasdell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a few different reasons. I have been planning to buy them for a while because of my eyes and focus fatiguing when I have to sit on the computer for long hours or under bright lights. I feel more productive, calmer, and all around they are what they say they are! I would and have already recommended them to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for about a week and really like them. The only issue I have is that they do not stay in place on the bridge of my nose if I tilt my head, but that's a trade off I'm willing to accept considering the function and look. I have noticed considerably less strain on my eyes and it seems as though I have better quality sleep when using these to block blue light at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: After wearing the whole screen is yellow, the glasses feel a lot easier.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. These are the eyes that really protect against blue light. The ones I bought before didn't work at all.Recently, due to work, I have been watching computer for a long time. My eyes have been distended and I have a migraine.With these new glasses, my eyes are definitely feeling better.My family laughed at me and said I was psychological.But my feelings were real. My eyes didn't hurt as much.It's true that blue light is quite irritating to the eyes, and once most of the blue light is filtered out, the eyes are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Giselle Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying Them & Buying More
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the light from screens at night and these were recommended. I can see why! I really enjoy wearing them! Very light weight. I feel like I get less eye strain. Love the quality. I’m actually purchasing the clear lens version for day use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blue-light blockers
customer_reviews.text: These are the highest quality anti-blue light glasses you will purchase anywhere. They block out more blue light than Gamma Ray and Gunnar's, which gives you longer computer time with these Swanwick Sleep glasses. I think the dark amber color helps block out more of the unwanted light. I need these glasses because I work online all day and my eyes were red and tired mid-day before these glasses, even using Gamma Ray's and turning my computer's brightness down. Now, my eyes are fine until the end of the day. I will be purchasing another pair for my son who has most of his school textbooks online and does 3-4 hours per day of homework.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love and gladly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more happy with these glasses! My mother sent me an article before I bought these about how “blue light blocking glasses help with sleep and anxiety.” After reading it I came onto amazon and these were the first ones I saw and BOOY am I so glad I saw these first! These are so perfect and help me be able to remain calm while shopping on my own and help me get to sleep faster and relax the strain in my eyes ON TOP of looking stylish. I couldn’t recommend these more, if you were on the fence about getting a pair, please do yourself a favor and get them.
customer_reviews.author: Joey G.

customer_reviews.title: I prefer them over True Darks
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the True Dark glasses, but they are so light-prohibitive that there's very little you can do once you put them on. You need to wear them for 45-60 minutes to get the full benefit, and it's hard to read or do much other than meditate while you're wearing them. The Swannies allow you to read, get work done on the computer or watch TV while also preparing yourself for sleep. This is what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Q

customer_reviews.title: Your eyes will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish and comfy! Only had a week or so, but my eyes definitely feel less strained as soon as I put them on. I have been turning off my wi-fi at night as well as using these, so getting uber good sleep these days! Gotta grab another pair for the hubby, he is jelly :D
customer_reviews.author: Blackliner

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep
customer_reviews.text: I first heard about Swanwick glasses on the internet and saw many people wear them and decided to get them for myself. They claim that it will help block the blue light which tricks our brain into thinking its still daytime, when really it's nighttime. The first night I used them I could notice a small difference for the better with my sleep. The next morning I felt more rested then I usually did and now I continue to wear them not only at home but also in public because the glasses are stylish! Big thank you to the team at Swanwick for creating these glasses! I definitely recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Alekseenko

customer_reviews.title: Tool for Titans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair for myself to try and noticed a difference in the effectiveness of my sleep after the first use. I still find it useful to curtail the screen exposure after 21:00 but these are particularly helpful if that is a struggle for you. I have since purchased a pair for each of my teenaged children and they are all grateful. The only drawback is that my son now thinks he’s got the ok to stay up and watch movies... Thanks for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Gill

customer_reviews.title: I tried these because I've been desperate for better sleep. I wear them faithfully from 8pm on ...
customer_reviews.text: Weird as it seems, I tried these because I've been desperate for better sleep. I wear them faithfully from 8pm on and it's been helping me get more sleep than I've been able to get for years. I'm definitely sleepier earlier in the evening when I wear them--not so wound up or stimulated. Who would have thought? I ONLY wish they fit over my regular glasses...
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Coulter

customer_reviews.title: FOR COMPUTER USE: TOPPS!
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my constant computer use daily and they seem to work very well cutting the glasre down. my eyes are much more comfortable witht the glasses and vision is clear. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: todd w

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and perfect for watching TV. That said, I can't see or feel why they would cost so much more than other blue light blockers. They should have come with a case for the price. So four stars.
customer_reviews.author: uncas

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for all graveyard workers!!
customer_reviews.text: While working at a hospital during graveyard shift and on the computer for 8 hours these help reduce migraines and increase drowsiness substantially!! By following the advice of putting them on 3 hours before the end of my shift, reducing the screen brightness to 30, and turning off 1 of the 2 lights in the office I felt sleepy within an hour. These are definetly a game changer! I've already recommended these to all my colleagues and friends who work graveyard and have trouble falling asleep after their shift.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Torres

customer_reviews.title: Top notch blue light blocking glasses
customer_reviews.text: You'll feel the the difference the first evening you wear it. I used to feel nauseated working on computer for 8 hours. Bought the night swannies and this was cured. I have no problems going back to bed after night shifts as well. Amazing inovation
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Jain

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these as I ended up going with the spektrum computer glasses. Not sure why but apparently it's not the blue light that was giving me headaches and eye strain. The spektrums on the other hand alleviate my headaches and work better for me. Everyone is different though. Good quality,better then the spektrums, just didn't help my eye strain and migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Never used them to sleep but when I fell asleep with them in plane, my nose was killing me :) Other than that good purchase. I have epilepsy so good for lighting
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: I’d rather look “geeky” than straining and squinting like Mr. Magoo
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these makes a major difference while looking at computer screen and with the glare of harsh fluorescent light above. The glasses really do cut out the awful blue light that I’m exposed to and helps balance my vision. I’m not embarrased about wearing them, I’d rather look “geeky” than straining and squinting like Mr. Magoo. Best thing about these blue light blocking glasses is that they’re affordable and not overpriced. Perfect for my budget. I only wish I had bought them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Storrar

customer_reviews.title: Great for late-shifts at a screen
customer_reviews.text: I work late shifts at a computer screen and it has really disrupted my sleep. Tried these glasses on the advice of a friend and the first time I wore them I fell asleep easier, and slept better, than I had in months. They look kind of weird, like I wouldn't wear them out and about. But they really do help with sleep and I'd recommend them for anyone who has to be looking at screens within a few hours of going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: If you're in front of computer screens all day or love using your phone before bed check these glasses out!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I work in front of computers all day and these glasses help reduce the strain from my eyes. I use them before bed and throughout the afternoon. I've noticed I'm able to fall asleep faster when I'm off work. They fit great and don't look that bad either. I haven't used them for gaming yet but I'm sure they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: ... computer for 10+ hours a day these glasses are perfect. They fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has to be in front of a computer for 10+ hours a day these glasses are perfect. They fit comfortably, and are particularly useful at nighttime, because ever since using them I feel like my brain has proper time to "cool down" which has helped with my previous sleeping problems. The only "downside" which isn't one in my opinion, is that it does not fit too comfortably over regular glasses but is perfect with contact use if you use vision assistance. I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Wear them everyday! Some games like FPS can be difficult to see at times, but normal viewing is very pleasing on the eye. Purchased 3 pair to have around the house and one to take to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Fotinos

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these glasses when I started my new job using 3 computers and extremely bright lights . These glasses really helped me immensely and are made very well. Would definitely recommend. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: a strange adjustment but still happy to have bought them to use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad i bought them but they definitely take some getting used to-- a big adjustment-- alters color of things like watching a movie which is strange--but "ok" after awhile. i appreciate not feeling so "drained" by screen time and that's really what i wanted most-- to protect myself from the harmful rays and feel better.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: these really work!
customer_reviews.text: I am an IT professional who works at two computer screens for most of the weekday. I also suffer from eye strain. At the end of the day I am worn out from the stress on my eyes. After trying another, cheaper pair of blue light-filtering glasses that had no effect, I bought these. I knew they worked immediately. They are comfortable to wear and I wear them at work and at night when watching TV. This is a great investment and will protect your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fatigued Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have a rare autoimmune eye disease called Birdshot Retinopathy, which causes inflammation (uveitis) in the back of the eye. I also work on a computer for many hours daily. Florescent office lights and lighting in stores, etc. bother me tremendously. I also have a hard time with transitioning from light to dark (driving at dusk, etc.). So I bought these hoping they would give me a little relief. They are fabulous! I am actually enjoying going shopping again. I know my purpose differs somewhat from the advertised use but these really cut down the glare and keep my diseased eyes from getting fatigued by the afternoon. They are also well-made and look decent on.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha F.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Eyes feel instantly "cool and relieved" when you put them on. Order these ! Love mine
customer_reviews.author: tgr

customer_reviews.title: Swanwick glasses
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my swanwick glasses. I have insomnia for the last 15 years. I try everything to get a good nights sleep and these glasses are really helping me. I use them to block light from my iPad and it seems to work. I am falling asleep easier. They are also much more comfortable then another pair I once tried. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: shelley harari

customer_reviews.title: Helps with artificial lighting and reduces time to fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used them for a week. Quick delivery. Work well during the day in a building with bright artificial lights with no windows. I wear them at home from sunset until I turn out all lights and lay down to sleep. I have been falling asleep faster and sleeping through the night. Note: I also use an eye mask, blackout curtains, grounding sheets, and white noise to sterilize my sleep environment. On time as promised. Great shipper and excellent product. Works as advertised. Falling asleep faster and sleeping better. Edit for spelling
customer_reviews.author: PTWOB 266

customer_reviews.title: but this one amazed me. I am software engineer and almost always ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I rarely write reviews, but this one amazed me. I am software engineer and almost always have to code, 2-3 hours before sleep. Especially when I work with clients in different time zones, my sleep was ruined, in the mornings I felt destroyed and tired. After wearing those shades for two-three days my sleep quality skyrocketed. I awake in the mornings deeply rested with full energy to engage the world. I carry them everywhere. It would be better if they are available in other forms
customer_reviews.author: giorgi baqradze

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I've made on Amazon. They work and they are durable.
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for 3 years and they are so good I am writing my first review on Amazon (Joined in 2009). I use them every night before bed and always thought they would break or scratch and they never did. They look brand new. The visuals are crisp and they work perfect at preventing blue light exposure before bed. They help me fall asleep quicker and get more quality sleep. Bravo to the company for creating these!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fishman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical first. But it works. I feel very calm at evening. It helps me sleep much better 1st night. i am astonished.
customer_reviews.author: AcuExpert

customer_reviews.title: They work well for me!
customer_reviews.text: These work great!! I have this eye condition that is causing my eye to be photosensitive. I work heavily all day in the IT field staring at computer screens so this really helps not only outdoors with the sun, but also with eye strain. Of course they look sexy too :-)
customer_reviews.author: DevGirl

customer_reviews.title: really do block blue light. Our fridge has blue ...
customer_reviews.text: really do block blue light. Our fridge has blue lights on it and while wearing these glasses, I thought the front panel was broken. Totally forgot I was wearing them. I have also noticed significant less eye strain when I wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Rippedgeek

customer_reviews.title: More restful sleep
customer_reviews.text: Was a little weary at first. Holy cr@p! I put them on just as the sun is setting, and I am so tired come bedtime. And I contribute this to having a much more restful sleep. I have a full-time job, young kids, and a side-hustle, so needless to say, the few hours I do sleep, they need to be as restful as possible. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Scheetz

customer_reviews.title: I just love Swanwick glasses
customer_reviews.text: These were the first swannies I got and they are the best reading glasses I've ever got... I've tested a lot of computer glasses and trust me.. there are no other like the Swanwick glasses...
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Nena

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes them for watching tv. Helps her unwind at night as it tones down the brightness and relaxes her.
customer_reviews.author: Vino

customer_reviews.title: My symptoms of dry eye have greatly diminished
customer_reviews.text: I was having a severe problem with dry eyes. And I use the computer at least two hours/day. A nurse friend told me about the blue light blocking glasses. I ordered them from Amazon. After using them while on the computer a short while, I no longer have a problem with dry eyes. In fact, I rarely need the eye drops any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: GETTEM
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are truly amazing the moment you put them on you'll notice a substantial difference. I work hours on end coding and usually had trouble sleeping, eye strain and headaches I can say with confidence these help. The only issue I have is a nick in corner of one of the lenses but it's only somewhat noticeable in my peripheral so no biggy. Overall, amazing product definitely these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved these Glasses
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these glasses! They definately make a big difference and my eyes don't get that tired and blury feeling after being in front of computer screen for hours. Worth the money paid!
customer_reviews.author: Ciaara

customer_reviews.title: They just work
customer_reviews.text: These things work! I was listening to a podcast and Mr. Swanwick was a guest. He talked about there glasses and how they blocked the light that kept your brain running. The first night I tried them I fell asleep while watching a show. Second night, same thing. I used to watch tv for hours and then toss and turn wishing I could sleep. I understand that it was a bad habit, but I didn't realize it was the blue light that was doing it. I'm going to keep these by my bed and start wearing them when I'm winding down. Pretty amazing really....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product built solid
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and they look pretty good. The frames are very solid. I work nights and my eyes start to get tired by 8pm and they almost feel like they are getting warmer. Listened to a podcast from the creator of these and read many Amazon reviews so figured I would give them a try. First few days my eyes felt allot better. Forget them at home one day and found my eyes getting tired and sore by 8pm. Hopefully I wont leave them at home anymore. I don't know about the melatonin increase since I take melatonin already.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P. Birnie

customer_reviews.title: They fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These stylish cool glasses are incredibly comfortable. You can actually see better in the dark. I highly recommend them to anybody wanting to improve their sleep and look stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Deniska

customer_reviews.title: Ideally I'd just stop using my devices at night but I find that like most people I'm just addicted to them
customer_reviews.text: Got my pair a couple weeks ago. Been really liking wearing them at night to use my phone, ipad, or Kindle. The light from these devices is much less harsh when wearing them. I've known about the problems associated with blue light for a long time but there were never any blue blockers that I would have considered purchasing. Ideally I'd just stop using my devices at night but I find that like most people I'm just addicted to them. The Swannies look awesome and work great. I'm buying another pair for a christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Cutting harmful blue rays has made a significant difference.
customer_reviews.text: I have a brain tumor pressing my right eye causing weakness and double vision. I’m not sure what happened when I put these glasses on but I got noticeable relief immediately. My vision sharpened and the double vision lessened noticeably. I wear these 100% of the time I use my iPad and phone now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a hard time sleeping and these glasses have helped him tremendously! Before he started wearing them he would be up off and on throughout the night; now he is able to get to sleep earlier and stay asleep for longer periods of time. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: garie sender

customer_reviews.title: Will write another review after a while but for now it seems like a pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week so far. At first it made displays a little larger, but now am used to it and dont have the normal eye strains i usually get after staring at the screen for long periods. Will write another review after a while but for now it seems like a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ADENIJI ADEBIMPE

customer_reviews.title: Best so far!!!!
customer_reviews.text: okay, it's only day one... but so far I'M in love. I've tried three other brand of orange glasses and these are by far the best! Granted they are 5 times + the cost... but ya know!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality. Improve sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I tried four different pair of inexpensive amber-lensed goggles/glasses to cut blue light and improve my sleep. All were clunky and uncomfortable and impossible to wear. Two were even painful. None of the four did a decent job blocking blue light, either, they just cast an orange tint on everything. I needed a solution and decided to try Swannies. Whoa. What an amazing difference! My Swannies are so comfortable, lightweight and yet sturdily constructed. The lenses block blue light surprisingly well and I'm already sleeping better. Thank you Swanwick for a truly superior product! Had I tried these first, I'd have spent less than half of what I spent trying to find a cheap option.
customer_reviews.author: JMDC

customer_reviews.title: 100% Refund Policy.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the glasses for several days and didn't see a significant difference, but everyone is different. What I liked was how they stood by their 100% refund policy and how easy Amazon made it to return the classes. I would recommend trying the glasses. Different people react differently. Worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Letcher

customer_reviews.title: Deep sleep improvement !
customer_reviews.text: What a difference these made in my deep sleep. I wore these about 90 mins before falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Your eyes are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Work very well. I notice a great improvement in eye strain when watching tv/using a computer. Frames are solid, especially at the joint, where there is a metal fitting. Lense very clear. I bought 2, one for home/tv, and one for work/computer. Wish I thought to buy these 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm at a computer or device around 8-10 hours a day
customer_reviews.text: and these have been great. I'm only on day 2 of using them and so far I have not had the same fatigue as working without them, no pinch over my ears, and they add just enough color "dampening" to make computing easier without destroying the nuances of color contrast.
customer_reviews.author: W. C Dotson

customer_reviews.title: These really work!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these for a few hours before bed (while watching tv or using my iPad) has really helped my sleep! I think I fall asleep easier, and don’t wake up as often during the night. They were recommended by my sleep doctor, and I am very happy to have them.
customer_reviews.author: JenR

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found Swannies
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Swannies. They arrived in perfect condition just a few days after I ordered them. Construction quality is good and the lenses are optically very good. I bought them to reduce eye strain because as a writer I spend hours every day looking at the computer screen.I've only used them for a few days, but I can definitely feel a difference in how my eyes feel at the end of the day. These are the first blue light blocking glasses I've tried, and so far I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Forster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for a while at night and so far - good quality - holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Dotar Sojat

customer_reviews.title: They REALLY work!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the real deal! They work and fit exactly as described. Well worth the price. I am even considering buying a pair for each family member. Thank you Swanwick Sleep!
customer_reviews.author: BGR8FUL

customer_reviews.title: Helps with sleep and reduces eye strain!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are excellent. I have had sleeping issues for years with being unable to fall asleep. Since I have started using these glasses, my sleeping has improved. I get sleepy faster. And, you can really tell the difference in how your eyes are strained by looking at the phone/computer without wearing these glasses versus when you put them on. I would highly recommend getting a pair of these!
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these glasses for 2 months now and they have made a tremendous difference in my life. I wear them in the evenings about 2 hours before I go to bed and fall asleep much quicker. The reduced eye strain from screens and florescent lighting also means I get headaches less often. The frames are comfortable and wearing them doesn't bother me at all. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective bluelight blocking glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I've come to enjoy deeper and longer sleep just two weeks after wearing Swanwick glasses. It was a very interesting experience. I made addituonal purchases to give my family and friends as presents. I strongly recommend Swanwick to those suffering sleep problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sinhwa Song

customer_reviews.title: My sleep problems have decreased!!!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses may just be making a difference! I have struggled with insomnia for 25 years. You explain that several weeks' use will create greatest improvement; already they seem to be making a difference. I ordered a pair for my daughter; she wished for a 2:00 % prescription, but you are out!!! So sorry. Please make more~
customer_reviews.author: Judith S. Blackman

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They really do work
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They really do work. I wear them at work because I sit in front of a computer all day. Since wearing them I no longer have eye strain or headaches from the bright florescent lights above me. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Napier

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are fantastic! I bought a pair as a birthday gift for my husband because he reads on his laptop every night before bed. He loved them so much and felt so strongly that they helped block the unhealthy blue light that we bought a pair for myself and our 10 year old son. We plan to purchase a pair for our 3 college kids and high schooler so they can do homework and be online late at night and have a reduction in sleep disturbance.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely brilliant! I work in front of a screen all day and have to work late into the night often- it throws out my circadian rhythms which I tried to remedy with taking Melatonin pills... didn't work. I use these when I work on the screen after the sun goes down (Using F.lux.app didn't have the same level of blue-blocking ability)- I now drift off and stay asleep all night. Incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I was sleeping 1 to 3 hours a night. I tried melatonin but it didn't help much. I have neuropathy & restless leg syndrome. Since I have been wearing these blue light blocking glasses, I get at least 4 to 5 hours of sound sleep. It's fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I now have both Swannies and Gunnar. Both are high quality and comfortable to wear. The Gunnars glasses block 65% of blue light and I am assuming that the Swannies block more since the lenses are darker. Swannie doesn't say how much theirs block on the website, but Gunnar does. Like both.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Altonaga

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I started feeling more eye strain then usual and bought these babies. My eyes feel happy now after staring at a computer screen for 9 hours day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does help you fall asleep faster and better
customer_reviews.text: At first i didn't noticed much when i was wearing them but after an hour or two of gaming i noticed my eyes were relaxed and didn't feel strained from gaming and when i finally went to bed i fell asleep fast and woke up refreshed i don't regret buying these, side note when playing certain games like fortnite its hard to tell what color gun you are looking at or picking up hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Edward M

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Swannies!!!  Great glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. Comfy Fit. Eyes much more relaxed at night reading on phone or tablet. Sleep is better...need more hours (but fewer hours have better quality now). Thanks Swannies!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Letson

customer_reviews.title: Sleep (+)  **  Active Usage (-)
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what to expect but it definetly makes it more comfortable to look at screens.It works. However i dont think this product is suitable for gaming or watching movies.Because everything gets freaking yellow and you absolutely lose details. It is ok for sleep but kind of annoying otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: kajve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it every night while Trading nag the European foreign currency market. Well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: product very nice, appear well made. really blocked out the blue light. However, my son the gamer did not like them so i had to return. He said it interfered with ability to see details while in game.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: love them so far
customer_reviews.text: love them so far. I spend all day on a computer, and got them to protect my eyes. I think all my co-workers will be ordering the glasses soon!
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Great for nighttime reading
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like my swannies. I like to read books on my phone before bed and it really helps to block the excess light to my eyes during this activity. My only complaints are that the arms are a bit long for my head so they tend to get pushed forward if I try to lay down, but they have to be one size fits all so I understand. Also, I can't use them to watch tv at night because I wear prescription glasses to see far away. Great for nighttime electronic trading though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love them, really do work well
customer_reviews.text: Love them, really do work well. Before my eyes would be strained and tired. The glare is gone and my eyes feel much better at the end of the day. Working under fluorescent lights in front of a computer all day is a killer on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses...great quality and preserves my eyes from blue light so that I am able to sleep better after working on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best enhancement to my fitness regimen in the last 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: On days when I wear the glasses I tend to have more restful sleep; which, I feel, means a more efficient recovery (from exercise). The best enhancement to my fitness regimen in the last 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Smith

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: Those glasses are excellent, they do their job extremely well. It is obvious how much of the blue light they block when I sometimes, wearing those glasses, turn my head down looking at the screen directly. The design is very convenient. I'm going to buy more for the rest of my family members. Thank you Swanwicks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy about this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some cheap one before and it does seem to work. This one has good quality and my eyes do feel less tired and I am happy about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: My son, who stays up late with electronic devices ...
customer_reviews.text: My son, who stays up late with electronic devices, was hesitant at first, but now he loves them and wears them nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Big A train

customer_reviews.title: Reduced my insomnia triggers considerably
customer_reviews.text: "you fall asleep on the couch but then when you go to bed you're wide awake" is what she used to say before I started using these to read my phone at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, they're stylish, they WORK, and they arrive quickly and without hassle. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: BiG O

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended if you spend lots of time in front of your computer!

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the pairs I got for $15 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the pairs I got for $15 dollars. If you stare at screens a lot, these are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Dossantos

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses really do help the eyes and brain settle down. I would wear them all day if I could!

customer_reviews.title: ... sure if it's a placebo effect but they look cool and do a good job filtering blue light
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's a placebo effect but they look cool and do a good job filtering blue light!
customer_reviews.author: UrbanaGirl

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are comfortable and I have noticed that the quality of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I work long hours in front of the computer and have problem sleeping at night. A friend suggested that I wear blue light blocking glasses. These glasses are comfortable and I have noticed that the quality of my sleep has been improved since I started wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: These are a pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and are large enough to fit over my prescription computer glasses. I use them every time.

customer_reviews.title: Made a huge difference
customer_reviews.text: Love the way that my eyes feel at the end of the day. These made a huge difference in getting rid of eye strain and headaches.
